data.actual_result: It appears, but the microphone is the same color as the menu bar background so you only see a red stripe
data.short_description: Muted and Deafened talking indicator in menu bar showing only red stripe on MacOS Dark theme
data.steps_to_repro: - Set MacOS to dark theme (System Prefs -> General -> Dark Dock and Menu Bar) - Get into a voice channel - Mute yourself - Observe
